description: Now that Diego is out of prison, Dalton Briggs knows it’s time for him to pay back hunky Diego for the last 10 years. Diego sends him to stake out their new target; a very sexy, tattooed stud named Beaux Banks. His mission is to get inside and get the penthouse key card, but when he gets into the room, he finds a hot and very naked Beaux coming out of the shower! Dalton distracts Beaux by sucking his big, wet, thick dick before turning him around to rim his eager, tight hole before sliding his cock inside.
title: The Heist Part 2
